document_notes.text:
This update for gegl fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10113: The process function in operations/external/ppm-load.c has unbounded memory allocation, leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure. (bsc#1089731)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: An issue was discovered in GEGL through 0.3.32. The process function in operations/external/ppm-load.c has unbounded memory allocation, leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
